# iosxr_segment_routing_mapping_server (Resource)

This resource can manage the Segment Routing Mapping Server configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_segment_routing_mapping_server" "example" {
  mapping_prefix_sid_address_family = [
    {
      af_name = "ipv4"
      prefix_addresses = [
        {
          address   = "10.1.1.0"
          length    = "24"
          sid_index = 500
          range     = 10
          attached  = true
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `mapping_prefix_sid_address_family` (Attributes List) Address Family (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mapping_prefix_sid_address_family))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--mapping_prefix_sid_address_family"></a>
### Nested Schema for `mapping_prefix_sid_address_family`

Required:

- `af_name` (String) Address Family
  - Choices: `ipv4`, `ipv6`

Optional:

- `prefix_addresses` (Attributes List) SID index range (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--mapping_prefix_sid_address_family--prefix_addresses))

<a id="nestedatt--mapping_prefix_sid_address_family--prefix_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `mapping_prefix_sid_address_family.prefix_addresses`

Required:

- `address` (String) IP address with prefix
- `length` (String) Prefix length
- `sid_index` (Number) Start of SID index range
  - Range: `0`-`1048575`

Optional:

- `attached` (Boolean) Attached entry advertised via the A-flag
- `range` (Number) Number of allocated SIDs
  - Range: `0`-`65535`

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_segment_routing_mapping_server.example ""
```
